text: This is a list of Dutch television related events from 1962. ==Events== *27 February - De Spelbrekers are selected to represent Netherlands at the 1962 Eurovision Song Contest with their song "Katinka". They are selected to be the seventh Dutch Eurovision entry during Nationaal Songfestival held at Concordia Theatre in Bussum. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1950s=== *NOS Journaal (1956–present) *Pipo de Clown (1958-1980) ==Ending this year== ==Births== *26 March - Paul de Leeuw, singer, comedian & actor *22 July - Cornald Maas, TV presenter *29 October - Myrna Goossen, TV & radio presenter ==Deaths==
title: 1962 in Dutch television
